name: BubbleUp
description:
BubbleUp is a full service digital agency offering digital leadership and strategy, SEO, SEM, social media marketing, e-commerce, web design and development, custom web development and more. BubbleUp was founded by innovators in marketing, entertainment and SaaS technologies, and our cutting edge solutions fuel the digital media platforms of several companies, artists and entertainers, and non-profits. BubbleUp is based in The Woodlands, TX with offices in Nashville, TN and Hartford, CT.
BubbleUp is well known for award-winning webÂ design, clever technology, best practice online marketing and incredible customer service. BubbleUp has won several Web Marketing Awards, a Webby, an MTV O Award, and been named one of Inc. 5000 America's Fastest Growing Companies (2012-2016).
